title: Cause of higher employment and lower interest rate

content.question: If an economy is operating with significant unemployment, a decrease in which of the following will most likely cause employment to increase and the interest rate to decrease?

choices.label: The central bank’s administered interest rates

content.answer: The central bank’s administered interest rates

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
